scripts.start: concurrently "generate-textures src/images src/textures.ts" "generate-howls assets-src/sound src/sound src/sounds.ts" "parcel src/index.html"
scripts.build: generate-howls assets-src/sound src/sound src/sounds.ts --build && generate-textures src/images src/textures.ts --build && parcel build --public-url ./ src/index.html
